评论详情: I purchased a set of earrings for a gift on Amazon the earrings are very nice but the box the came in was less than satisfactory. I ordered this velvet top box and it made the earrings look far more expensive than they really were. I am very pleased with the quality of this jewelry display box.

类型: Size: Long T-style EarringColor: Navy Blue
评论详情: I wanted a pretty velvet box that would nicely display a pair of stud earrings.  The box arrived and there was this white outline on the top of the velvet part of the box. The earring holder inside is basically a piece of paper. It’s not very solid/strong.  Do not buy.
